item.title: Money laundering, buying elections and housing affordability
item.description: How do you buy a federal election? Through money laundering, by confusing correlation and causation and mindlessly parroting collective wisdom around housing affordability. View the post at LinkedIn, or Vifortech Solutions - Blog.
